name: God's Chosen
description:
God has chosen you to protect Earth from Satan's minions. To do so, he gave you a special weapon: the holy water gun. This gun shoots holy water bullets to make sure Satan's minion go back to Hell. 

Controls:

WASD - move

Mouse - camera

Left click - Shoot

Esc - Pause

This game was made by Eva Agramunt and Alba Roncero for a school project.
